name: Shrub, 2020
description:
This work took place in connection with my love for nature, drawing, abstract art and minimalism. I haven't learned to draw yet, but I found an alternative. I draw with light on the camera matrix. It is like drawing blindly and therefore the pictures are abstract. In the course of digital manipulation, I got an abstract bush. I found in this work some kind of purity, some kind of conciseness, which I sometimes lack in our time, overloaded with information. 
Digital manipulated photography, light drawing, 3744x5616 px, 72 DPI
